name: Nightly 14 about:home Soft Dark
description:
Included in Firefox Nighly 14 soft dark

http://userstyles.org/styles/63894/firefox-nightly-14-soft-dark
css: /* Created  by Antonio Ferreiro "a3c" 09-04-2012*/@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document url("about:home") {window,body{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.6)!important;background-image:url("chrome://browser/skin/newtab/noise.png"),-moz-linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0,0.5),rgba(0,0,0,0.2))!important;color:#ccf!important}body{height:99.85%!important;width:99.85%!important}#launcher{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.1)!important;border-top:none!important;box-shadow: 0 1px 44px rgba(0,0,0,.6) inset,0 -1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.15)!important}button{border-radius:4px!important}button,#searchSubmit{-moz-appearance:none!important;color:hsl(210,30%,85%)!important;text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 hsla(210,8%,5%,.45)!important;background:-moz-linear-gradient(center top ,hsl(209,18%,34%),hsl(212,23%,16%)),-moz-linear-gradient(hsla(209,13%,54%,.35), hsla(209,13%,54%,.1) 85%, hsla(209,13%,54%,.2)) padding-box!important;box-shadow:0 1px 0 hsla(209,29%,72%,.15) inset, 0 0 0 1px hsla(209,29%,72%,.1) inset, 0 0 0 1px hsla(209,29%,72%,.1), 0 1px 0 hsla(210,16%,76%,.1)!important;-moz-margin-end:3px!important;border: 1px solid hsla(211,68%,6%,.5)!important}button:hover,#searchSubmit:hover{-moz-appearance:none!important;color:#eef!important;background-color:hsla(209,18%,48%,1)!important;background:-moz-radial-gradient(center bottom,hsla(190,50%,55%,.8),transparent),-moz-linear-gradient(center top,hsla(209,18%,34%,1),hsla(212,23%,16%,1)),-moz-linear-gradient(hsla(209,13%,54%,.35), hsla(209,13%,54%,.1) 85%,hsla(209,13%,54%,.2))!important;outline:none!important;opacity:1.0!important;color:#ddf!important;text-shadow:0 0 5px hsla(190,50%,80%,.6)!important;border-color:hsla(190,50%,75%,.6) hsla(190,50%,65%,.6) hsla(190,50%,55%,.6)!important;box-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1),0 0 10px hsl(190,50%,75%)!important;-moz-transition:background-color .3s,border-color .35s ease,box-shadow .4s ease!important;outline:none!important;opacity:1.0!important;color:#ddf!important;text-shadow:0 0 5px hsla(190,50%,80%,.6)!important}#searchSubmit{border-radius:0 25px 25px 0!important}menulist,textbox,#searchText{-moz-appearance:none!important;box-shadow:1px 1px 5px #000 inset,0 -1px 1px 1px #454e5f inset!important;background:#223!important;text-shadow:1px 1px 1px rgba(200,200,255,.5),-1px -1px 1px #000!important;font-weight:normal!important;color:#ccf!important}#searchText{border-radius:25px 4px 4px 25px!important}}
